text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali leads Security Forces and Customs Day.
- Joint high commission of Tunisia and Ivory Coast starts meetings in Tunis to reinforce cooperation.
- Consumer price index rose by 0.2 percent in March compared to February.
- President Ben Ali tells security forces and customs to be firm in implementing law while being friendly with citizens.
- Rainfall in central and southern Tunisia.
- Euromoney magazine ranks Tunisia's risk at 55th in world, well below Egypt, Morocco and Jordan.
